dbms.util
Class Page

java.lang.Object
  dbms.util.Page

public class Page
extends java.lang.Object

Describes the page class as our DBMS system understands it. A page is the set of records that a leaf (primary or secondary) contains.

          The bucket factor.

Inserts the new record to the last position of the page

Parameters:
newRecord - the new record

deleteRecord

public void deleteRecord(int index)
Deletes a record from the page. It actually makes the record a "dead" record and puts it last into the page. It does not remove the object itself.

Parameters:
index - the index of the record - target

removeRecord

public Record removeRecord(int index)
Deletes a record from the page. It actually removes the object itself (on the contrary with the delete method.

Parameters:
index - the index of the record - target
Returns:
the record that was removed
